original_text: Then some boats from Tiberias landed near the place where the people had eaten the bread after the Lord had given thanks.
korean_text: (그러나 디베랴에서 배들이 주께서 축사하신 후 여럿이 떡 먹던 그 곳에 가까이 왔더라)

sentences.original_text: Then some boats from Tiberias landed
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 디베리아에서 온 몇 척의 배가 상륙했고

sentences.original_text: near the place where people had eaten bread
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 떡을 먹었던 그곳 근처에 상륙했습니다

sentences.original_text: after the Lord had given thanks
